## Return Value

The receiver’s DTD kind. See Constants for a list of valid NSXMLDTDNodeKind constants.

## Discussion

The DTD kind is distinct from a `NSXMLDTDNode` object’s node kind (returned by the `NSXMLNode` [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/XMLNode/kind-swift.property] method).

# dtdKind

**Instance Property**

Returns the receiver’s DTD kind.

## Declaration

```swift
var dtdKind: XMLDTDNode.DTDKind { get set }
```

## Return Value

The receiver’s DTD kind. See Constants for a list of valid NSXMLDTDNodeKind constants.

## Discussion

The DTD kind is distinct from a `NSXMLDTDNode` object’s node kind (returned by the `NSXMLNode` [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/XMLNode/kind-swift.property] method).
title: dtdKind
